select_criteria.name: select_criteria
select_criteria.title: 1. Select Criteria
select_criteria.instructions:
Follow the three step process to schedule alert.
  • Please select one of the following domains and also select the desired filters.
  • Click 'Next' button to view and customize the results.
  • Click 'Clear All' to clear out the filters applied.

customize_results.name: customize_results
customize_results.title: 2. Customize Results
customize_results.instructions:
Further narrow down the results using the 'Narrow down your search' functionality.
  • Click 'Export' button to download the results into excel.
  • Click 'Back' to go back to Step1: Select Criteria
  • Click 'Next' button to Schedule Alert.

schedule_alert.name: schedule_alert
schedule_alert.title: 3. Schedule Alert
schedule_alert.instructions:
• Checkbook alerts will notify you by email when new results matching your current search criteria are available. Use options below for alert settings.
  • Provide email address, in order to receive alerts. Emails will be sent based on the frequency selected and only after the minimum number of additional results entered has been reached since the last alert.
  • Click 'Back' to go back to Step2: Customize Results
  • Click 'Schedule Alert' to schedule the alert
  • The user shall receive email confirmation once the alert is scheduled.

confirmation.name: confirmation
confirmation.instructions:
Thank you for Scheduling your Alert!
You will receive a confirmation email soon.
